Literature.Title: Characterization of two relacidines belonging to a novel class of circular lipopeptides that act against Gram-negative bacterial pathogens.
Literature.Author: Li Z, Chakraborty P, de Vries RH, Song C, Zhao X, Roelfes G, Scheffers DJ, Kuipers OP

Literature.Title: Novel Modifications of Nonribosomal Peptides from Brevibacillus laterosporus MG64 and Investigation of Their Mode of Action
Literature.Author: Li Z, de Vries RH, Chakraborty P, Song C, Zhao X, Scheffers DJ, Roelfes G, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris NCCB 92058(MIC=0.25-0.5µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris NCCB 92058(MIC=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas translucens pv. graminis LMG 587(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. antirrhini LMG 2131(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum LMG 5863(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Ralstonia syzygii subsp. syzygii LMG 6969(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli TOP 10(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli TOP 10(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>32µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli MG1655 ΔatpC(MIC=1µg/ml)
